contest-event.event-date: Sept. 9, 1933 D Butlins (Class A) Butlins Holiday Camp Contest (Championship Section) 5 Other Butlins Holiday Camp Contest butlins-holiday-camp-contest-championship Coriolanus Butlins, Skegness, Lincolnshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £30 and trophy, 2nd £20, 3rd £10, 4th £8, 5th £7. This was the first time Billy Butlin ran a brass band contest. More details can be found at http://www.4barsrest.com/articles/2010/1205a.asp. Whilst the holiday camp hadn't been built at this time, the contest was still held at Skegness. 14 bands competed Jan. 24, 2011, 10:14 p.m. Dec. 31, 2018, 3:37 p.m. 1 Luton Band Edward Sydney Carter 2 Wallace Arnold (Rothwell) Band Harry Nuttall 3 Whitwell Brass Band J. A. Greenwood 4 Swanwick Colliery F. Skidmore 5 Ollerton Colliery Silver Prize Band E. Slack Unknown Result Bolsover Colliery S. Jennings Unknown Result Emley Public John Wilkinson Unknown Result Grimethorpe Colliery Band William Foster Unknown Result Harworth Brass J. A. Greenwood Unknown Result Huthwaite Prize Band Charles Cooper Unknown Result Oldham Rifles Band G. Lawson Unknown Result Rushden Town Silver Prize Band M. J. Roberts Unknown Result Staffordshire Band E. T. Smith Unknown Result Stanley Newmarket Colliery Band Percy Holgate Withdrawn Atherton Public Prize Band Abram Fairclough Withdrawn BHK (UK) Horden Band Joseph Foster Withdrawn Worksop Miners Welfare Band Clyde Pressley
